pullrequest.title: Add support for nested models in Gazebo

content.raw: I think currently branch `mentor2_v2` supports both partially and fully scoped names. It first tries to get the scoped name, if it fails, it replaces the top level model name with the internal parent model name and tries to get that. That's how it's being possible to insert several vehicles at once in MENTOR2. [This](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/commits/d8633d0d6d8d5d82521962c4b6c4f9e9eef9d79d?at=default) is the relevant commit.
content.html: I think currently branch mentor2_v2 supports both partially and fully scoped names. It first tries to get the scoped name, if it fails, it replaces the top level model name with the internal parent model name and tries to get that. That's how it's being possible to insert several vehicles at once in MENTOR2. This is the relevant commit.
